documents.description: NICAP report from June 1960 detailing electromagnetic effects linked to UFO sightings and encounters

documents.title: Important Memo From Source S 1
documents.description: Memo dated 7 July 1999 from Source S-1, purportedly a CIA counterintelligence operative, revealing details on Majestic-12 operations, UFO cover-ups, and related government secrets

documents.title: Joint R&D Annexes, Agenda Of 5th Meeting
documents.description: December 1946 agenda and annexes for the 5th meeting of the Joint R&D Board, including directives on electronics and biological warfare committees, and personnel roster, in the context of early Majestic-12 UFO-related research and development

documents.title: Joint R&D Board Security Regulations
documents.description: Security regulations issued by the Joint Research and Development Board on 15 June 1947, outlining classification procedures, handling of top-secret information, and security protocols, in the context of early post-WWII research potentially linked to UFO investigations and Majestic-12 operations

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only Assessment Situation Statement Position UFOs
documents.description: Documents related to the Majestic-12 group marked 'For Majic Eyes Only,' containing a situational assessment and a formal statement of position regarding Unidentified Flying Objects.

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only JFK MJ 12
documents.description: Restricted Majestic-12 documents marked 'For Majic Eyes Only' concerning President John F. Kennedy, detailing interactions or correspondence between JFK and the MJ-12 group regarding extraterrestrial phenomena.

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only Majestic 2017
documents.description: A 2017 compilation of Majestic-12 documents marked 'For Majic Eyes Only,' featuring the 'Assessment of the Situation on Unidentified Flying Objects' and other related intelligence briefings.

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only MJ 12 Intel Estimate
documents.description: Restricted Majestic-12 intelligence documents marked 'For Majic Eyes Only,' providing a strategic intelligence estimate regarding the nature, capabilities, and implications of Unidentified Flying Objects.

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only MJ 12 One Year Assessment
documents.description: Restricted Majestic-12 documents marked 'For Majic Eyes Only,' providing a comprehensive one-year assessment of data, activities, and analysis regarding the UFO phenomenon.

documents.title: Majestic 12 Documents For Majic Eyes Only MJ 12 SOM
documents.description: Restricted Majestic-12 documents marked 'For Majic Eyes Only' containing the Special Operations Manual (SOM), detailing protocols for the recovery, handling, and security of extraterrestrial craft and biological entities.
